tool_description:
"Siri as a service"

The objective of this service is to provide you and your robot with the smartest answer to any natural language question, just like Siri. This service provides an interface to the standard functions that users demand of modern voice assistants. For example chatting, looking up information, creating messages and much much more. It also provides useful metadata such as sentence analysis and entity extraction that goes beyond simple chatting and voice commands. Over 3 million users have already been in contact with this API: 
http://www.voice-actions.com/ 
Examples: https://weannie.pannous.com/api?input=hi&login=test-user 
For examples and documentation see https://ask.pannous.com/?input=hi
name: Siri
title: Siri

api_list.name: JSON
api_list.description: complex result with text, images, actions and meta-data

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: get more location aware responses. if omitted the IP will used to guess the location.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Specify locale. E.g. de, en, fr, en_US. Default is en_US

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description: Specify the timezone offset of your client compared to UTC in minutes. E.g. +120 for Germany (summer). Attention: include daylight savings! Default is 0 which is UTC.

api_list.name: Text
